transcript:
to be talking to a staff officer of such importance. "It's a lovely place! We passed close to the park and saw two deer . . . and what a splendid house!" 
"Look, Prince," said another, who would have dearly liked to take another pie but felt shy, and therefore pretended to be examining the countryside "See, our infantrymen have already got there. Look there in the meadow behind the village, three of them are dragging something. They'll ransack that castle," he re- marked with evident approval.
